As a condition precedent to receipt of a Seismic Safety Loan, the Borrower shall maintain or cause to be maintained insurance in types and amounts determined by the City's Risk Manager and the Program Administrator. The Program Regulations shall include guidelines for such required insurance coverage, which may include but shall not be limited to general liability insurance, property insurance, and workers compensation coverage. 
(Formerly Sec. 66A.21; added by Ord. 100-94, App. 3/11/94; renumbered by Ord. 2-01, File No. 001969, App. 1/12/2001)
(Former Sec. 66A.20 renumbered as Sec. 66A.19 by Ord. 2-01.)
